CHAT.comment: mom and child approach the tank.
mom tickles child and they laugh.
child puts hands over sensors and computer box beeps and mom makes a startled noise.
mom and child speak simultaneously and mom takes finger out of child's nose.
mom puts her finger over the middle sensor and it makes the sound.
child puts her finger over the middle sensor and nothing happens.
mom puts her finger over the middle sensor and it makes the sound again.
child touches the top sensor and computer box beeps.
mom touches the top sensor and it makes the same noise twice.
mom kisses child's back and mom and child laugh.
mom makes a ringing sound and covers child's eyes and INV brings car into the room.
child tilts car back and the hood opens.
child pushes car and it crashes into the heater.
mom pushes car through child's legs and mom and child laugh.
mom pushes car but it doesn't go through the child's legs.
mom pushes car through child's legs.
child pushes car through mom's legs.
child throws meerkat on the couch and child throws meerkat to mom and mom catches it.
mom gives meerkat to child and child kisses meerkat.
mom puts meerkat under the back of child's shirt.

g.ga: pretends meerkat is whispering in her ear

CHAT.comment: mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom and child speak simultaneously
child tries to climb onto the table and mom stops her and mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom and child laugh.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
degu sniffs child's finger through the top of the cage.
child puts her finger on the cage and squeals and laughs again.
child puts her finger on the cage and squeals and laughs again.
child can't squeeze chair through to face the degu.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child knocks on the cage and the degu runs to the other side of it.
robodog moves its head down.
robodog lays on its stomach and its legs hang off the table.
robodog stays still.
robodog starts moving.
child bends tail back and forth.
child picks up robodog and takes it to the table.
robodog sits on its hind legs and almost falls off the table.
robodog sits on its hind legs and almost falls over.
robodog pushes itself onto its head and mom and child laugh.
robodog makes a strange sound because it's stuck.
robodog tries to move but child holds it down on the couch and robodog stops moving.
